bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names xin shen bu zu 心神不足 , heart spirit [qi] insufficiency. Pathological Condition of forgetfulness and palpitation with fear brought forth by depletion of spirit qi, and a disharmony of qi and blood. Pu ji fang 普濟方 337: 心氣虛乏而神不足之屬，皆以 氣血不調之故也 , “All [conditions] associated with heart qi depletion and spirit [ qi ] insufficiency result from a disharmony of qi and blood”.
